original_text: And again I say unto you, It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle, than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God.
korean_text: 다시 너희에게 말하노니 낙타가 바늘귀로 들어가는 것이 부자가 하나님의 나라에 들어가는 것보다 쉬우니라 하시니

sentences.original_text: And again I say unto you
It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle
than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God
sentences.korean_translation: 부자가 하나님의 나라에 들어가는 것보다 쉬우니라
